system.description:
A finely cut, clear gem. Gazing through the gem reveals hidden, enchanted, and invisible things.

  • Secret doors and traps: Are revealed.

  • Invisibility: Invisible objects and creatures are perceived.

  • Illusions: Are seen through.

  • Enchantments: Enchanted objects and creatures are made apparent.

  • Range: Up to 30’.

  • Scanning speed: An area of 100 square feet (e.g. ten × 10’ squares) can be scanned in one round.

  • Chance of error: Per usage, there is a [[/br 1d100]]{5%} chance that the gem will provide false information—a hallucination of something which is not really there.
